title: IndeaYoga
tag_words: Bharath Shetty, Yoga, Health, Fitness, Meditation, Peace,
nearestplace:
Alwar Kala Bhavan
Sri Krishna Temple
details: &lt;div&gt;IndeaYoga is the yogic system developed and employed by Yogacharya Bharath Shetty at IndeaYoga and Yoga Bharata shalas. It combines Hatha, Ashtanga and Iyengar styles of yoga and is practiced without the use of props. Dea is Sanskrit for light. The philosophy of the IndeaYoga system is to activate each practitioner's inner light and enable him/her to lead life mindfully.&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;With different programs in Mysore, IndeaYoga offers intelligent yoga classes for all levels along with a variety of workshops, philosophy, Pranayama, meditation sessions and teacher training. The professional, creative and affable teachers at IndeaYoga are here to offer you a high level of education in a pleasant ambiance without any pressure. Our motto is Na hathÄth, na bhalÄth (no force, no pressure).&lt;/div&gt;

title: Mysore Mandala Yogashala
tag_words: Ashtanga Vinyasa Yoga, Hata Yoga, Back Bending Class, Pranayama and Yogasutras, Ayurvedic Courses, Shatkriya Classes.
details: &lt;div&gt;Mysore Mandala is a laid-back, reasonably-priced center whose classes are led by the cheery BNS Iyengar. No relation to the famous BKS Iyengar of Pune, BNS Iyengar's yoga house offers not only pure Vinyasa Ashtanga yoga, but an assortment of classes in yoga philosophy, local culture, Kundalini and even interesting tidbits like henna painting or Bharath Natyam dance.&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Mysore Mandala is open all year, with the high season running from November to March and the mid-season running through July and August. There are morning and evening classes given in Ashtanga and the more gentle Hatha styles. These run six days a week &ndash; Sunday is always a day of rest &ndash; and are drop-in style, meaning that there is no need to book a set number of classes. All skill levels are catered for and private classes can be arranged directly with the center. The Teacher Training programs, which run over six weeks from 6 AM to 4.30 PM every day except Sunday, are offered in both styles at well. These are given in the gurukulam way, which usually means that the student lives with the teacher, but in this case means that the students spends their days with the teacher in the teacher's own practice space.&lt;/div&gt;

title: Ashtanga Yoga Mysore
tag_words: Teacher Training courses in Ashtanga Vinyasa Yoga and Hatha Yoga
details: At Ashtanga Yoga Mysore we offer Teacher Training courses in Ashtanga Vinyasa Yoga and Hatha Yoga among other short term yoga programs customized to suit your needs. There are several reasons why people want to do a Teacher Training Course in yoga among which improving or deepening their practice is the most common one. So whether you want to further your practice and knowledge to teach better, help others or learn and take it as a career, this course provides an opportunity to deepen your practice, become more mindful and gain a better understanding of Ashtanga Yoga or Hatha Yoga. &lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;Also, study the theoretical, physical and spiritual components of Ashtanga Yoga or Hatha Yoga in a disciplined &amp;amp; encouraging environment. Our ashtanga and hatha yoga teacher training course suits all levels of yoga practitioners. So whether you want to teach yoga or not this course aims to rekindle your passion towards yoga &amp;amp; at the same time giving you a deeper understanding of the basic principles of ashtanga yoga or hatha yoga.&lt;br&gt;

title: MYSORE KRISHNAMACHARR YOGA SHALA
tag_words: BNS Iyengar, Ashtanga yoga, Hata Yoga, Teacher's Training for Yoga
details: &lt;div&gt;Mysore Krishnamacharr Yoga Shala has been Sri BNS Iyengar's primary place to teach for the last 10 years. Mysore Krishnamacharr Yoga Shala is under the management of Kanchen Mala. The Shala is dedicated to teaching all aspects of yoga, including Asana, Pranayama, Mudra, Philosophy, Chanting, Ayurveda, and Teacher Training. We provide certification for all of our courses including Teacher Training.&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Located in central Mysore, we offer a clean, private space in which to practice Yoga. Students are required to register for a minimum of one month. Multiple subjects may be taken during this period to create a complete and in depth yoga experience. Asana is taught in the mornings and various other subjects are taught through the day. We offer accommodations nearby for those who prefer to have a short walk to classes.&lt;/div&gt;

details: Pattabhi Jois harnessed and developed the Ashtanga style beginning in the 1930s. Eschewing elements of yoga like philosophy and meditation, Jois focused completely on challenging physical movements and breathing. His philosophy was very simple: Complete the movements and the rest will naturally follow. The style has taken the yoga world by storm, and Ashtanga is one of the most easily recognized terms, along with Iyengar and Bikram.&lt;br&gt;

details: Mystic School is a space for spiritual practice where you can learn not only Yoga, but many other healing techniques.&lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;The Yoga TTC offered by Noah Mckenna will bring you to a safe practice and to become an outstanding teacher. All this with a holistic approach, following baby steps and with tons of real teaching practice!&lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;Mystic School is also a great place to relax and chill out, enjoying some of the best facilities in Mysore, like its equipped Shala or its Jacuzzi in the lounge roof top.&lt;br&gt;

details: &lt;div&gt;Yogadarsanam is india&rsquo;s topmost Yoga teachers training school in the world map based on Ashtanga vinyasa &ndash; Mysore style and Hatha yoga vinyasa &ndash; B.K.S Iyengar style with other contemporary yoga methods developed by founder and director Yogacharya and Rashtra vibhushana awarder Santhosh Kumar.Our Iyengar yoga is mainly based on alignment and precise movement of Yoga asanas with proper understanding of breathe and techniques. We encourage students to do naturally with out use of more probes with proper corrections and adjustments where as Mysore style allows students to practice in their own speed and capacity with the supervision of master by connecting posture to posture with Bandha(Lock), Dristi ( Concentration Points) and powerful fire breathe- ujjayi. also Guru&rsquo;s led class challenges pupil to follow speed and rhythm of Vinyasa yoga.&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Our Yoga institute also offers many other yoga courses like Yoga therapy, Prenatal yoga, Mudra yoga, Acro yoga and regular yoga classes on many yoga styles and spirituality practice.&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Yoga students will stop searching and catch up Yogadarshanam If they are looking for yoga retreat in India or Yoga schools in India for Yoga teachers training in India in Hatha Yoga or Ashtanga Yoga from beginners to Advance levels.&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Our school also focuses on Pranayama and Meditation classes to learn with solid base with proper personal attentions.Today, It is well known meditation centre in Mysore to conduct Meditation classes for Spirituality and Therapeutic benefits. We give this in course basis as well as a part of our Yoga Therapy training and Certified Yoga Instructors Course. All Yoga seers will receive Yoga knowledge with customized theory, philosophy,technical informations with history of India Yoga traditions in simplified way in easy English language.&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;All this has made Yoga students to choose Yogadarshanam as one of the best yoga centre to study classical yoga in Mysore, South India as a comprehensive collections of many Yoga masters gift having 900+ Certified Yoga Teachers in 93+ Counties.&lt;/div&gt;
